title: Strengthening Management Strategy Practical Competencies: Japanese Video Game Translation Practical Skills Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Japanese language proficiency at JLPT N3 level or higher and basic translation knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: In-game dialogue, UI, and event text can be accurately translated from Japanese to Korean
Localization strategies reflecting the cultural context of video games can be developed
Translation projects can be managed using smartphone-based collaboration tools in limited technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
